title: ADVISORY-India markets closed on Monday for holiday
text:
ADVISORY-India markets closed on Monday for holiday

Forex 6 minutes ago (Oct 21, 2019 07:00)

© Reuters. ADVISORY-India markets closed on Monday for holiday Oct 21 (Reuters) - India's currency, debt and equity markets will be closed on Monday for elections in the western state of Maharashtra. Financial markets will resume trading on Tuesday, Oct. 22. The benchmark BSE index closed up 0.63% at 39,298.38 on Friday, while the broader NSE index ended 0.65% higher at 11,661.85. The 10-year benchmark bond yield IN072629G=CC closed at 6.70%, while the rupee INR=D4 settled at 71.15 to the dollar. (bangalore.newsroom@thomsonreuters.com)

ADVISORY-India markets closed on Monday for holiday
